pgTitle: List of longest streams of Oregon

56mi 97km The distance between the source and the upstream boundary of the Wild and Scenic section, which begins at river mile (RM)50.4 (river kilometer81.1) and ends at the mouth, is an estimate based on map scale and ruler.

51mi 82km{{#tag:ref|About miles (km) of the Applegate River flow through Oregon. This is the sum of the miles (km) marked on topo maps plus the remaining distance to the California border, measured by map scale and ruler.
